Package model.handcard

Class HandCardList

java.lang.Object
model.handcard.HandCardList
public class HandCardList
extends java.lang.Object
This is a circular double linked list, which contains the hand card nodes. The user can navigate through it in vevery direction.

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    private HandCardNode currentDisplay
    this is the current card that is displayed.
    private HandCardNode head
    this is the head of the handcard list.
    private int size
    This is the size of the list.
    private HandCardNode tail
    this is the end of the handcard list.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    HandCardList()
    this is the creator of the list.
